Comment: I don't know how we want to represent the relationship between frontal cortex and frontal lobe;  right now
I'm going to relate them through "Same As" relationship
although I'm not going to assert that these two terms are synonymous
Frontal cortex.Definition: Anterior portion of the frontal cortex, lying anterior to the central sulcus in humans.  It is bounded by the parietal cortex posteriorly and the temporal cortex laterally.
